english_translation: Narrated by Mujahid regarding the saying of Allah: 'If only he had been given like what Moses was given' (Surah al-Qasas 28:48), he said: The Jews command the Quraysh to ask Muhammad for what Moses was given. So Allah said to Muhammad: Say to the Quraysh, let them say to the Jews: 'Did they not disbelieve in what was given to Moses before' (Surah al-Qasas 28:48).
